promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic gecko fighting-type pokemon holding an red and black axe. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Axizard, a a chibi young basic gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Eerie Fluid, Cavern Counter. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Axizard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Hailing from battle-prone habitats, this diminutive dynamo, Axizard, counters with cave-born tactics and delivers uncanny liquid assaults.
